text:
*[Bug 18755] New: fround() and fprec() are misdocumented in Writing R Extensions*
<https://bugs.r-project.org/show_bug.cgi?id=18755>

            Bug ID: 18755
           Summary: fround() and fprec() are misdocumented in Writing R
                    Extensions
           Product: R
           Version: R-devel (trunk)
          Hardware: All
                OS: All
            Status: UNCONFIRMED
          Severity: trivial
          Priority: P5
         Component: Documentation
          Assignee: <mailto:R-core@R-project.org|R-core@R-project.org>
          Reporter: <mailto:p.krivitsky@unsw.edu.au|p.krivitsky@unsw.edu.au>

The relevant part of the manual
(<https://cran.r-project.org/doc/manuals/r-release/R-exts.html#Numerical-Utilities>)
says that `fprec()` rounds to decimal places after decimal point and `fround()`
to significant digits, when it's the other way around.

The relevant part of the manual
(
rounds to decimal places after decimal point and
to significant digits, when it's the other way around.

text:
*[Bug 18755] fround() and fprec() are misdocumented in Writing R Extensions*
<https://bugs.r-project.org/show_bug.cgi?id=18755>

Martin Maechler (<mailto:maechler@stat.math.ethz.ch|maechler@stat.math.ethz.ch>) changed:

           What    |Removed                     |Added
----------------------------------------------------------------------------
                 CC|                            |maechler@stat.math.ethz.ch
         Resolution|---                         |FIXED
             Status|UNCONFIRMED                 |CLOSED

--- Comment #1 from Martin Maechler (<mailto:maechler@stat.math.ethz.ch|maechler@stat.math.ethz.ch>) ---
Yes, thank you!
  Amazingly this was accidentally swapped wrongly on 2000-02-20, a few days
before release of R 1.0.0,  and then never noticed (!).
Fixed with svn rev 86874  (for R-devel)  and also ported to the R 4.4.x branch.

text:
*[Bug 15554] bessel function issues*
<https://bugs.r-project.org/show_bug.cgi?id=15554>

Ben Bolker (<mailto:bbolker@gmail.com|bbolker@gmail.com>) changed:

           What    |Removed                     |Added
----------------------------------------------------------------------------
                 CC|                            |bbolker@gmail.com

--- Comment #10 from Ben Bolker (<mailto:bbolker@gmail.com|bbolker@gmail.com>) ---
For what it's worth, as of r86871 issues 1 and 2 are alive and well ...

```
besselJ(1.5,1700.5)
## [1] 0
## Warning message:
## In besselJ(1.5, 1700.5) : bessel_j(1.5,nu=1700.5): precision lost in result
besselJ(1.5,-1700.5)
## [1] Inf
## Warning message:
## In besselJ(1.5, -1700.5) :
##   bessel_y(1.5,nu=1700.5): precision lost in result
gsl::bessel_j0(1.5,1700.5)
## $val
## [1] 0.6649967
## $err
## [1] 2.953178e-16
## $status
## [1] 0
gsl::bessel_j0(1.5,-1700.5)
## $val
## [1] 0.6649967
## $err
## [1] 2.953178e-16
## $status
## [1] 0
```
